name: DreamWorks Trolls Pop ‎
description:
Join Poppy, Branch and all your favorite Troll friends in Trolls Pop – a new bubble shooter with fun missions and levels! Pop bubbles and collect Trolls as you blast through levels to unlock and earn rewards!

FEATURES
• Bubble Shooter Puzzle Game: Match and pop through 300 levels with more added regularly
• Special Missions: Play through missions such as Pop’em All, Baby Bug Rescue, and more to earn chests filled with stickers to help collect your Trolls
• Power-Ups: Need a little help popping through those bubbles? Use the Magic Missile, Rainbow Bubble, Razzle Dazzle and The Disruptor to blast your way through!
• Collect Your Favorite Trolls: Collect stickers to add Poppy, Branch, DJ Suki, and more to your Trolls collection
• Customize Your Trolls: Collect fun and unique costumes to make your Troll one of a kind
• Challenges & Events: Check back often to collect rare and exclusive Trolls

Need some help? Visit our support page:
https://huuuge.helpshift.com/a/trollspop/?p=ios

Trolls Pop is free to play, but you can purchase game items with real money.

To play this game, you must read and consent to the following:
Privacy Policy: https://huuugegames.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Service: https://huuugegames.com/terms/
EULA: https://huuugegames.com/eula/
